messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Unschooling resources on audio, video or DVD
messages.msgSnippet: ... ============= http://sandradodd.com/rentalk There s a CD of the talk that followed that  (and other CDs available at the same link (from this link)
messages.messageBody:
On Jan 31, 2006, at 12:32 PM, hollywoodapi wrote:

> Are there any unschooling resources on audio, CD, video or DVD?

=============

http://sandradodd.com/rentalk
There's a CD of the talk that followed that (and other CDs available
at the same link (from this link)

http://sandradodd.com/tapes

The Peaceful Parenting tape there is a joint talk, me and Dr. Richard
Prystowsky. Male and PhD both; that might help.

Sandra

messages.subject: Unschooling resources on audio, video or DVD
messages.msgSnippet: Dear All, Are there any unschooling resources on audio, CD, video or DVD? I am having a hard time getting my husband to read any books on the subject, but if
messages.messageBody:
Dear All,

Are there any unschooling resources on audio, CD, video or DVD?

I am having a hard time getting my husband to read any books on the
subject, but if it is something he can listen to or watch on TV he
would be more likely to do so.

Thank you in advance for all of the recommendations.

Kind regards,
Anna
